heroDescription: We're here to help. Contact us for immediate support
subject: Subject
successMessage: Your message has been sent successfully! We'll get back to you soon.
defaultError: An error occurred while sending the message. Please try again.
contactDescription: Feel free to contact us for any inquiries or assistance

faq1.question: How can I book an appointment?
faq1.answer: You can book an appointment through the website or app with simple steps

faq2.question: Is the service available 24/7?
faq2.answer: Yes, booking and technical support services are available 24/7

faq3.question: How can I cancel an appointment?
faq3.answer: You can cancel appointments from My Appointments page up to 24 hours before

contactFormErrors.name: Name must be at least 2 characters
contactFormErrors.phone: Phone must be at least 10 digits
contactFormErrors.subject: Subject must be at least 3 characters
contactFormErrors.message: Message must be at least 10 characters
